alert.note: Alert for Carter; Fallon (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 09 at 8:39PM MST until November 11 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MST THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow, heavy at times. Snow accumulations between 4 and 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph, creating significant blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Carter and Fallon. * WHEN...Until Midnight MST Thursday Night. * IMPACTS...Roads will become slick and hazardous. Visibilities may drop to a half mile or less, due to falling and blowing snow. Expect very difficult travel conditions. Allow extra time for your Thursday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind chills will range from zero to 10 below.
info.instruction: Plan any travel carefully. Make sure your vehicle is winterized and in good working order. Consider taking a winter storm kit along with you, including such items as tire chains, booster cables, flashlight, shovel, blankets, and extra clothing. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
